snippet.title: Drone Gladiator - Windows 10 Gameplay
snippet.description:
NOTE: While the game is also on Xbox One, this gameplay is taken from the standalone Windows 10 version that also supports Xbox Live achievements, which the Steam version doesn't have.

Drone Gladiator (C) Flying Islands Team
Get the Windows 10 version here: https://bit.ly/3zGQ9qe
Get the Xbox One version here: https://bit.ly/3zKAeXL
